title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 520.1 - Scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 520.1 - Scope

State Regulations

This Part sets forth procedures for providing an
individual with notice that tax overpayments owed to an individual taxpayer, estate or trust are being credited to repay overpayments of medical assistance
payments owed to the department or a social services district by individuals
who are or have been enrolled as providers in the medical assistance program
and procedures for such individuals to contest determinations of the department
to make such credits of their tax overpayments. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
520.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
